comment: Born again types are idiotic. Many of these modern/western sects are. But I would urge you to look at the Orthodox Church. It was the foundation of Byzantine (longest empire ever). They recognise ethnic and racial differences. This is real, oldest Christianity in the world.
amr:
# ::snt Born again types are idiotic. Many of these modern/western sects are. But I would urge you to look at the Orthodox Church. It was the foundation of Byzantine (longest empire ever). They recognise ethnic and racial differences. This is real, oldest Christianity in the world.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (ii / idiotic
            :domain (t / type
                  :ARG1-of (b / bear-02
                        :mod (a / again))))
      :snt2 (s / sect
            :quant (m2 / many)
            :ARG1-of (ii2 / include-91
                  :ARG2 (s2 / sect
                        :mod (w / world-region
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "West"))
                        :mod (t2 / this))))
      :snt3 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG2 (u / urge-01
                  :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
                  :ARG1 (y / you)
                  :ARG2 (l / look-01
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 (o / organization
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Orthodox"
                                    :op2 "Church")))))
      :snt4 (f / found-01
            :ARG0 (e / empire
                  :mod (c2 / country
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Palestine"))
                  :ARG1-of (h / have-degree-91
                        :ARG2 (l2 / long-03
                              :ARG1 e)
                        :ARG3 (m3 / most)
                        :ARG5 (e2 / ever))))
      :snt5 (r / recognize-02
            :ARG0 (t3 / they)
            :ARG1 (d / differ-02
                  :ARG1 (e3 / ethnic)
                  :ARG2 (r2 / race)))
      :snt6 (r3 / religious-group
            :name (n4 / name
                  :op1 "Christianity")
            :ARG1-of (r4 / real-04)
            :ARG1-of (h2 / have-degree-91
                  :ARG2 (o2 / old)
                  :ARG3 (m4 / most)
                  :ARG5 (w2 / world))))

comment: The Orthodox Church refuses to associate with racists. I get wanting to believe a romantic view, but its time to wake up to the lies youve been force-fed
amr:
# ::snt The Orthodox Church refuses to associate with racists. I get wanting to believe a romantic view, but its time to wake up to the lies youve been force-fed
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (r / refuse-01
            :ARG0 (o / organization
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Orthodox"
                        :op2 "Church"))
            :ARG1 (a / associate-01
                  :ARG0 o
                  :ARG1 o
                  :ARG2 (r2 / racist)))
      :snt2 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (g / get-03
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1 (w / want-01
                        :ARG0 ii
                        :ARG1 (b / believe-01
                              :ARG0 ii
                              :ARG1 (v / view-02
                                    :mod (r3 / romantic)))))
            :ARG2 (t / time
                  :time-of (w2 / wake-up-02
                        :ARG1 (y / you)
                        :ARG2 (l / lie-08
                              :ARG1-of (f / force-01
                                    :ARG2 y))))))
